methods.name: restorePurchases
methods.docs: Restores a user's previous  and links their appUserIDs to any user's also using those .

methods.name: purchaseProduct
methods.signature: (options: { productIdentifier: string; planIdentifier?: string; productType?: PURCHASE_TYPE; quantity?: number; appAccountToken?: string; }) => Promise<Transaction>

parameters.name: options
parameters.type: { productIdentifier: string; planIdentifier?: string | undefined; productType?: PURCHASE_TYPE | undefined; quantity?: number | undefined; appAccountToken?: string | undefined; }

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - The product to purchase

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productIdentifier - The product identifier of the product you want to purchase.

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productType - Only Android, the type of product, can be inapp or subs. Will use inapp by default.

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.planIdentifier - Only Android, the identifier of the plan you want to purchase, require for for subs.

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.quantity - Only iOS, the number of items you wish to purchase. Will use 1 by default.

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.appAccountToken - Only iOS, UUID for the user's account. Used to link purchases to the user account for App Store Server Notifications.

methods.docs: Started purchase process for the given product.

methods.name: getProducts
methods.signature: (options: { productIdentifiers: string[]; productType?: PURCHASE_TYPE; }) => Promise<{ products: Product[]; }>

parameters.name: options
parameters.docs: - The product identifiers you wish to retrieve information for

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - The product identifiers you wish to retrieve information for

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productIdentifiers - Array of product identifiers

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productType - Only Android, the type of product, can be inapp or subs. Will use inapp by default.

tags.name: returns
tags.text: - The requested product info

methods.docs: Gets the product info associated with a list of product identifiers.

methods.name: getProduct
methods.signature: (options: { productIdentifier: string; productType?: PURCHASE_TYPE; }) => Promise<{ product: Product; }>

parameters.name: options
parameters.docs: - The product identifier you wish to retrieve information for

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - The product identifier you wish to retrieve information for

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productIdentifier - The product identifier

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productType - Only Android, the type of product, can be inapp or subs. Will use inapp by default.

tags.name: returns
tags.text: - The requested product info

methods.docs: Gets the product info for a single product identifier.

methods.name: isBillingSupported
methods.docs: Check if billing is supported for the current device.

tags.name: returns
tags.text: an Promise with version for this device

tags.name: throws
tags.text: An error if the something went wrong

methods.docs: Get the native Capacitor plugin version

methods.name: getPurchases
methods.signature: (options?: { productType?: PURCHASE_TYPE | undefined; } | undefined) => Promise<{ purchases: Transaction[]; }>

tags.name: param
tags.text: options - Optional parameters for filtering purchases

tags.name: param
tags.text: options.productType - Only Android, filter by product type (inapp or subs). If not specified, returns both types.

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise that resolves with array of user's purchases

tags.name: throws
tags.text: An error if the purchase query fails

methods.docs:
Gets all the user's purchases (both in-app purchases and subscriptions).
This method queries the platform's purchase history for the current user.

methods.name: getLatestSignedTransaction

tags.name: returns
tags.text: Promise with the JWT token

tags.name: throws
tags.text: An error if no transactions found or StoreKit 2 not available

methods.docs: Get the latest signed transaction JWT token. iOS only.

methods.name: showManageSubscriptions
methods.docs: Opens the native subscription management interface for the user.

methods.name: addListener
methods.docs:
Listen for StoreKit transaction updates delivered by Apple's Transaction.updates.
Fires on app launch if there are unfinished transactions, and for any updates afterward.
iOS only.

properties.name: transactionId
properties.docs: The unique transaction identifier.

properties.name: originalTransactionId
properties.docs: The original transaction identifier (for renewals). iOS only.

properties.name: receipt
properties.docs: Receipt data for validation (iOS only - base64 encoded receipt)

properties.name: productIdentifier
properties.docs: Product Id associated with the transaction.

properties.name: productId
properties.docs: Product identifier associated with the transaction. iOS only.

properties.name: quantity
properties.docs: Purchase quantity. iOS only.

properties.name: purchaseDate
properties.docs: Purchase date (string in ISO 8601 format for Android, number in milliseconds since epoch for iOS).

properties.name: originalPurchaseDate
properties.docs: Original purchase date (string in ISO 8601 format for Android, number in milliseconds since epoch for iOS).

properties.name: signedDate
properties.docs: Transaction signed date in milliseconds since epoch. iOS only.

properties.name: expirationDate
properties.docs: Expiration date of the transaction in ISO 8601 format (for subscriptions).

properties.name: expiresDate
properties.docs: Expiration date for subscriptions (in milliseconds since epoch). iOS only.

properties.name: isActive
properties.docs: Whether the transaction is still active/valid.

properties.name: willCancel
properties.docs: Whether the subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing cycle, or null if not cancelled. Only available on iOS.

properties.name: purchaseState
properties.docs: Purchase state of the transaction.

properties.name: transactionReason
properties.docs: Transaction reason (PURCHASE, RENEWAL, etc.). iOS only.

properties.name: environment
properties.docs: App Store environment (Sandbox/Production). iOS only.

properties.name: storefront
properties.docs: App Store storefront. iOS only.

properties.name: storefrontId
properties.docs: App Store storefront identifier. iOS only.

properties.name: price
properties.docs: Transaction price. iOS only.

properties.name: currency
properties.docs: Currency code. iOS only.

properties.name: subscriptionGroupId
properties.docs: Subscription group identifier (for subscriptions). iOS only.

properties.name: webOrderLineItemId
properties.docs: Web order line item identifier. iOS only.

properties.name: appTransactionId
properties.docs: App transaction identifier. iOS only.

properties.name: bundleId
properties.docs: App bundle identifier. iOS only.

properties.name: deviceVerification
properties.docs: Device verification data. iOS only.

properties.name: deviceVerificationNonce
properties.docs: Device verification nonce. iOS only.

properties.name: inAppOwnershipType
properties.docs: In-app ownership type (PURCHASED, FAMILY_SHARED, etc.). iOS only.

properties.name: jwt
properties.docs: Signed transaction JWT token. iOS only.

properties.name: orderId
properties.docs: Order ID associated with the transaction (Android).

properties.name: purchaseToken
properties.docs: Purchase token associated with the transaction (Android).

properties.name: isAcknowledged
properties.docs: Whether the purchase has been acknowledged (Android).

properties.name: productType
properties.docs: Product type (inapp or subs).

properties.name: type
properties.docs: Product type (Auto-Renewable Subscription, Consumable, etc.). iOS only.

properties.name: isTrialPeriod
properties.docs: Whether the transaction is a trial period.

properties.name: isInIntroPricePeriod
properties.docs: Whether the transaction is in intro price period.

properties.name: isInGracePeriod
properties.docs: Whether the transaction is in grace period.

properties.name: identifier
properties.docs: Product Id.

properties.name: description
properties.docs: Description of the product.

properties.name: title
properties.docs: Title of the product.

properties.name: price
properties.docs: Price of the product in the local currency.

properties.name: priceString
properties.docs: Formatted price of the item, including its currency sign, such as €3.99.

properties.name: currencyCode
properties.docs: Currency code for price and original price.

properties.name: currencySymbol
properties.docs: Currency symbol for price and original price.

properties.name: isFamilyShareable
properties.docs: Boolean indicating if the product is sharable with family

properties.name: subscriptionGroupIdentifier
properties.docs: Group identifier for the product.

properties.name: subscriptionPeriod
properties.docs: The Product subcription group identifier.

properties.name: introductoryPrice
properties.docs: The Product introductory Price.

properties.name: discounts
properties.docs: The Product discounts list.

properties.name: numberOfUnits
properties.docs: The Subscription Period number of unit.

properties.name: unit
properties.docs: The Subscription Period unit.

properties.name: identifier
properties.docs: The Product discount identifier.

properties.name: type
properties.docs: The Product discount type.

properties.name: price
properties.docs: The Product discount price.

properties.name: priceString
properties.docs: Formatted price of the item, including its currency sign, such as €3.99.

properties.name: currencySymbol
properties.docs: The Product discount currency symbol.

properties.name: currencyCode
properties.docs: The Product discount currency code.

properties.name: paymentMode
properties.docs: The Product discount paymentMode.

properties.name: numberOfPeriods
properties.docs: The Product discount number Of Periods.

properties.name: subscriptionPeriod
properties.docs: The Product discount subscription period.

members.name: INAPP
members.docs: A type of SKU for in-app products.

members.name: SUBS
members.docs: A type of SKU for subscriptions.
